snippet: Rick Santorum tells a chapel full of pastors that faith and reason guide him on every issue.
abstract: Rick Santorum tells a chapel full of pastors that faith and reason guide him on every issue.
lead_paragraph: McKINNEY, Tex. - The morning after sweeping three Republican presidential contests, Rick Santorum traveled here, to a town 40 miles north of Dallas, on Wednesday to tell a chapel full of pastors how he came to center his life around his faith.

headline.main: Santorum Talks Faith With Texas Pastors
